topics.title: Service Overview
topics.summary: Describe MiNiFi's role as an edge data collection agent and how it differs from NiFi core.
topics.research_request: Summarize MiNiFi architecture, use cases, and its relationship to Apache NiFi.

topics.title: Installation and Packaging
topics.summary: Explain distribution layout, install steps, and platform considerations for MiNiFi deployments.
topics.research_request: Document MiNiFi installation workflow, packaging outputs, and supported target environments.

topics.title: Bootstrap and Lifecycle
topics.summary: Detail bootstrap.conf options, lifecycle commands, and how the agent manages its runtime.
topics.research_request: Explain MiNiFi bootstrap configuration, lifecycle commands, and runtime management.

topics.title: Flow Configuration
topics.summary: Describe how MiNiFi consumes config YAML/JSON, supports C2 updates, and maps to NiFi processors.
topics.research_request: Document MiNiFi flow configuration formats, deployment steps, and central management workflows.

topics.title: Provenance and Reporting
topics.summary: Explain provenance capture options, status reporting, and forwarding data back to NiFi or monitoring systems.
topics.research_request: Summarize MiNiFi provenance options, reporting tasks, and integration with upstream monitoring.

topics.title: Remote Communication
topics.summary: Cover site-to-site, REST, and C2 communication paths between MiNiFi and central NiFi deployments.
topics.research_request: Explain MiNiFi remote communication options, including C2 protocol usage and site-to-site configuration.

topics.title: Security and TLS
topics.summary: Detail TLS enablement, keystore configuration, and sensitive property handling for MiNiFi.
topics.research_request: Provide guidance on securing MiNiFi, including TLS configuration and sensitive property handling.

topics.title: Extensions and Components
topics.summary: Describe available MiNiFi processors, NAR bundles, and extension development patterns.
topics.research_request: Summarize MiNiFi extension bundles, supported processors, and guidance for building new components.

topics.title: Monitoring and Logging
topics.summary: Explain logging configuration, status reporters, and how to monitor MiNiFi health.
topics.research_request: Provide instructions for configuring MiNiFi logging, status reporting, and health monitoring.

topics.title: Upgrade and Maintenance
topics.summary: Outline version upgrade workflow, compatibility considerations, and agent maintenance tasks.
topics.research_request: Describe MiNiFi upgrade planning, maintenance windows, and compatibility guidance.

topics.title: Docker and Edge Deployments
topics.summary: Discuss container images, IoT packaging, and orchestrating MiNiFi across edge fleets.
topics.research_request: Summarize MiNiFi container images, configuration options, and orchestration strategies for edge fleets.

topics.title: Integration with NiFi
topics.summary: Explain how MiNiFi agents integrate with NiFi pipelines, including flow promotion and provenance exchange.
topics.research_request: Provide guidance on pairing MiNiFi with NiFi, managing flow promotions, and synchronizing provenance.
